The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 01 November is 879,046 (1,561.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 27 October, there were 128,388 new confirmed cases (228.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 20 October, there were 113,750 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 13% ( 14,638 extra cases).
